Obadiah or Abdias__01.12__Thou shalt not look: : or, thou shouldst not, etc. It is a reprehension for what they had done, and at the same time a declaration that these things should not pass unpunished.-- Ibid.
Obadiah or Abdias__01.12__Thou shalt not magnify thy mouth: : That is, thou shalt not speak arrogantly against the children of Juda as insulting them in their distress.
